titleStmt.title: The Bishop of Winchester's vindication of himself from divers false, scandalous and injurious reflexions made upon him by Mr. Richard Baxter in several of his writings ...
titleStmt.author: Morley, George, 1597-1684.

titleStmt.title: The Bishop of Winchester's vindication of himself from divers false, scandalous and injurious reflexions made upon him by Mr. Richard Baxter in several of his writings ...
titleStmt.author: Morley, George, 1597-1684.
Morley, George, 1597-1684. Bishop of Worcester's letter to a friend for vindication of himself from Mr. Baxter's calumny.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher for Joanna Brome,

notesStmt.note: "The Bishop of Worcester's letter to a friend for vindication of himself from Mr. Baxter's calumny" is a reprint of the letter of 1662, and has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

person.death: 1684. Bishop of Worcester's letter to a friend for vindication of himself from Mr. Baxter's calumny.
